recoding
_meta_P5LIVE
contents.code:
/*	_meta_P5LIVE // cc teddavis.org 2019, 2021	*/

let fontPath = 'includes/fonts/RobotoMono-Regular.ttf',
	fg, bg, pg, y = 0,
	w = 0,
	fc = 0,
	c = [0, 0, 255],
	rBox = 0,
	c1 = 0,
	c2 = 255,
	dx = 7,
	dy = 4,
	font

function preload() {
	font = loadFont(fontPath)
}

function setup() {
	createCanvas(windowWidth, windowHeight, WEBGL)
	background(0)
	noFill()
	fill(255)
	noStroke()
	fg = createGraphics(width, height)
	bg = createGraphics(width, height)
	pg = createGraphics(width, height)
	buildBox(fg)
	buildBox(bg)
	buildBox(pg)
	textFont(font)
	textSize(48)
	textAlign(CENTER, BOTTOM)
	buildP5LIVE()
}

function draw() {
	background(0)
	noCursor()
	orbitControl(5)

	rotateX(radians(0))
	rotateY(radians(sin(fc * 0.005) * 25))

	scale(0.57)

	if(frameCount % 8 === 0) {
		y += 20
		if(y > height) {
			y = 0
			buildBox(fg)
			c = [random(255), random(255), random(255)]
			c1 = random(255)
			c2 = random(255)
			let dd = 4
			dx = floor(random(1, dd))
			dy = floor(random(1, dd))
			buildBox(bg)
		}
		fg.fill(255)
		fg.noStroke()
		if(random(1) > 0.25)
			fg.rect(0, y, random(50, 350), 15)
	}

	bg.fill(c1)
	bg.stroke(c2)
	bg.strokeWeight(1)
	bg.ellipse(frameCount * dx % width, fc * dy % height, 50 + sin(fc * 0.03) * 250)



	push()
	translate(0, 0, -100)
	buildFont('p5.js', -width / 2)
	texture(bg)
	plane(bg.width, bg.height)
	pop()

	buildFont('ace-editor', -width / 2)
	texture(fg)
	plane(fg.width, fg.height)

	// P5LIVE 
	// label
	push()
	translate(0, 0, 100)
	buildFont('P5LIVE', -width / 2)
	pop()

	// layer
	push()
	translate(0, 0, 100)
	texture(pg)
	plane(pg.width, pg.height)
	pop()

	// cursor
	translate(0, 0, 101)
	fill(255)
	let mx = map(mouseX - width / 2, 0, width, 0, pg.width)
	let my = map(mouseY - height / 2, 0, height, 0, pg.height)
	let mscl = height * .04
	textSize(mscl)
	text('+', mx, my)

	fc++
}

function buildGUI(label, yoffset, yheight) {
	let bw = pg.width * 0.18
	pg.fill(80)
	pg.rect(pg.width * 0.99 - bw, yoffset, bw, yheight)
	pg.fill(30)
	pg.rect(pg.width * 0.99 - bw, yoffset, bw, pg.height * 0.03)
	pg.fill(200)
	pg.textSize(18)
	pg.text(label, pg.width * 0.99 - bw + 5, yoffset + 5, bw, pg.height * 0.03)
}

function buildBox(tg) {
	tg.clear()
	tg.noFill()
	tg.stroke(255)
	tg.strokeWeight(3)
	tg.rect(1, 1, tg.width - 2, tg.height - 2)
}

function buildFont(txt, xoff) {
	push()
	let yoff = 50
	let slant = 50
	translate(xoff, -height / 2)
	fill(255)
	noStroke()
	text(txt, -slant, -yoff)

	stroke(255)
	line(0, 0, -slant, -yoff)
	noStroke()
	pop()
}

function buildP5LIVE() {
	push()
	translate(0, 0, 100)
	// buildFont('P5LIVE', -width / 2)
	pg.clear()
	buildBox(pg)
	push()
	pg.noStroke()
	pg.fill(150, 100)
	let bw = pg.width * 0.2
	pg.rect(pg.width - 1 - bw, 1, bw, pg.height - 2)
	pop()
	pg.noFill()
	pg.stroke(150)
	pg.strokeWeight(1)

	// p5live
	buildGUI('P5LIVE', pg.height * 0.025, pg.height * 0.08)

	// cocoding
	buildGUI('COCODING', pg.height * 0.125, pg.height * 0.08)

	// recoding
	buildGUI('RECODING', pg.height * 0.225, pg.height * 0.08)

	// sketches
	buildGUI('SKETCHES', pg.height * 0.325, pg.height * 0.65)

	let sketchH = pg.height * 0.02
	let sc = 0
	for(let i = 0; i < pg.height * 0.55; i += sketchH) {
		pg.noStroke()
		pg.fill(60)
		if(sc % 3 === 0 || sc % 4 === 0) {
			pg.fill(30)
		}

		if(sc == 5) {
			pg.fill(30, 100, 30)
		}
		let sw = pg.width * 0.18
		pg.rect(pg.width * 0.99 - sw, pg.height * 0.325 + pg.height * 0.08 + i, sw, sketchH)
		sc++
	}
}

contents.name: _meta_P5LIVE_COCODING
contents.code:
/*	_meta_P5LIVE_COCODING // cc teddavis.org 2019-23	*/

let fontPath = 'includes/fonts/RobotoMono-Regular.ttf',
	fg, bg, plg, y = 0,
	w = 0,
	fc = 0,
	c = [0, 0, 255],
	rBox = 0,
	c1 = 0,
	c2 = 255,
	dx = 7,
	dy = 4,
	font, colors = [],
	colorsSel = 0,
	cocoders = 6

function preload() {
		font = loadFont(fontPath)
	}

function setup() {
	createCanvas(windowWidth, windowHeight, WEBGL)
	background(0)
	noStroke()
	textFont(font)
	textSize(48)
	textAlign(CENTER, BOTTOM)
	fg = createGraphics(width / 4, height)
	bg = createGraphics(width, height, WEBGL)
	plg = createGraphics(fg.width * cocoders *1.2, height)
	buildBox(fg, color(255))
	buildBox(bg, color(255))
	buildBox(plg, color(255))
	bg.background(50)
	genColors()
}

function draw() {
	background(0)
	orbitControl(5)
	rotateY(-radians(sin(fc * .0015) * 45))
	rotateX(radians(sin(fc * .0025) * 25))
	scale(.55)

	if(random(1) > .97) {
		y += 20
		if(y > height) {
			y = 5
			buildBox(fg, 255)
			c = [random(255), random(255), random(255)]

			let dd = 4
			dx = floor(random(1, dd))
			dy = floor(random(1, dd))
			genColors()
			bg.background(50)
		}

		if(random(1) > .5) {
			colorsSel = floor(random(colors.length))
		}
		fg.fill(colors[colorsSel])
		fg.noStroke()
		if(random(1) > .25)
			fg.rect(5, y, random(50, 250), 15)
	}

	c1 = abs(sin(frameCount * .1) * 255)
	c2 = 255 - c1
	bg.reset()

	bg.rotateY(radians(frameCount / 4))
	for(let i = 1; i < cocoders+1; i++) {
		bg.noStroke()
		bg.fill(255)
		bg.noFill()
		bg.strokeWeight(.125)
		bg.stroke(colors[i - 1])
		bg.rotateY(radians(i * .6 + frameCount / i))
		bg.translate(width / 8, height / 6)
		bg.rotateZ(radians(i * .6 + frameCount / i))
		bg.translate(width / 8, height / 8)
		if(colorsSel + 1 == i) {
			bg.torus(i * 30, i * 10)
		}
	}

	push()
	translate(0, 0, -120)
	buildFont('p5.js', -width / 2, color(255))
	texture(bg)
	plane(bg.width, bg.height)
	pop()

	rBox = colorsSel

	for(let i = 0; i < cocoders; i++) {
		let xoff = fg.width * cocoders / 2.1
		let x = map(i, 0, cocoders - 1, -xoff , xoff)
		push()
		translate(x, 0)

		if(rBox == i) {
			let setColor = color(colors[i].levels)
			setColor.setAlpha(100)
			fill(setColor)
			noStroke()
			push()
			translate(0, 0, -1)
			plane(fg.width, fg.height)
			pop()
		}

		buildFont('COCODER ' + (i + 1), 0, colors[i])
		texture(fg)
		plane(fg.width, fg.height)
		pop()
	}

	push()
	translate(0, 0, 100)
	buildFont('P5LIVE', -plg.width / 2, color(255))

	texture(plg)
	plane(plg.width, plg.height)
	pop()

	fc++
}

function genColors() {
	colors = []
	for(let i = 0; i < cocoders; i++) {
		colors.push(color(random(255), random(255), random(255)))
	}
}

function buildBox(pg, col) {
	pg.clear()
	pg.noFill()
	pg.stroke(col)
	pg.strokeWeight(3)
	pg.rect(1, 1, pg.width - 2, pg.height - 2)
}

function buildFont(txt, xoff, col) {
	push()
	let yoff = 50
	let slant = 50
	translate(xoff, -height / 2)
	fill(col)
	noStroke()
	text(txt, -slant, -yoff)
	
	stroke(255)
	line(0, 0, -slant, -yoff)
	noStroke()
	pop()
}

_webgl_primatives
contents.code:
/*	_webgl_primatives // cc teddavis.org 2019	*/

let v = .3

function setup() {
	createCanvas(windowWidth, windowHeight, WEBGL)
	angleMode(DEGREES)
}

function draw() {
	background(0)
	orbitControl(5)

	ortho()

	if(mouseIsPressed) {
		lights()
		noStroke()
		fill(255)
	} else {
		stroke(255)
		noFill()
	}


	push()
	translate(rPos(0))
	rotateX(frameCount / 4)
	rotateZ(frameCount / 2)
	plane(150, 150)
	pop()

	push()
	translate(rPos(50))
	rotateX(frameCount / 4)
	rotateZ(frameCount / 2)
	box(150)
	pop()

	push()
	translate(rPos(100))
	rotateX(frameCount / 4)
	rotateY(frameCount / 4)
	sphere(100)
	pop()

	push()
	translate(rPos(150))
	rotateX(frameCount / 4)
	rotateY(frameCount / 4)
	ellipsoid(100, 30)
	pop()

	push()
	translate(rPos(200))
	rotateY(frameCount / 2)
	rotateX(frameCount / 3)
	cone(100, 150)
	pop()

	push()
	translate(rPos(250))
	rotateX(frameCount / 4)
	rotateZ(frameCount / 3)
	torus(100, 50)
	pop()

	push()
	translate(rPos(300))
	rotateY(frameCount / 2)
	rotateZ(frameCount / 4)
	cylinder(100, 100)
	pop()
}

function rPos(off) {
	let x = (sin(off + frameCount * v) * width / 3)
	let y = (cos(off + frameCount * v) * height / 3)
	return createVector(x, y)
}

contents.code:
/*
	_HY5_p5_hydra // cc teddavis.org 2024
	pass p5 with type into hydra
	docs: https://github.com/ffd8/hy5
*/

let libs = ['https://unpkg.com/hydra-synth', 'includes/libs/hydra-synth.js', 'https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/ffd8/hy5@main/hy5.js', 'includes/libs/hy5.js']

// sandbox - start
H.pixelDensity(2) // 2x = retina, set <= 1 if laggy

s0.initP5() // send p5 to hydra
P5.toggle(0) // hide p5

src(s0)
.add(src(o0).scale(1.03), .9)
.modulateScale(noize(1000), .1)
.out()
// sandbox - end

function setup() {
	createCanvas(windowWidth, windowHeight)
	textAlign(CENTER, CENTER)
}

function draw() {
	clear()
	blendMode(DIFFERENCE)
	fill(255)	
	circle(mouseX, mouseY, height/2)
	circle(width-mouseX, height-mouseY, height/2)
	textSize(height/3)
	translate(noise(frameCount*.0051)*width, noise(frameCount*.005)*height)
	text('P5LIVE',0, 0)
}

contents.name: _hy5_hydra_p5
contents.code:
/*
	_HY5_hydra_p5 // cc teddavis.org 2024
	pass hydra into p5
	docs: https://github.com/ffd8/hy5
*/

let libs = ['https://unpkg.com/hydra-synth', 'includes/libs/hydra-synth.js', 'https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/ffd8/hy5@main/hy5.js', 'includes/libs/hy5.js']

H.pixelDensity(2) // 2x = retina, set <= 1 if laggy

// sandbox - start
s0.initP5()

gradient(1)
	.blend(noize()
		.scale(1.1))
	.modulateScale(noize(), .2)
	.out(o0)
// sandbox - end


function setup() {
	createCanvas(windowWidth, windowHeight, WEBGL)
	angleMode(DEGREES)
	noStroke()
	P5.zIndex(1)
}

function draw() {
	clear()
	orbitControl(3)
	rotateY(frameCount / 3)
	rotateX(frameCount / 4)

	texture(H.get())
	box(height / 2)
}

contents.name: _hy5_hydra_p5_hydra
contents.code:
/*
	_HY5_hydra_p5_hydra // cc teddavis.org 2024
	pass p5 into hydra
	docs: https://github.com/ffd8/hy5
*/

let libs = ['https://unpkg.com/hydra-synth', 'includes/libs/hydra-synth.js', 'https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/ffd8/hy5@main/hy5.js', 'includes/libs/hy5.js']

// sandbox - start
s0.initP5()
P5.toggle(0)
H.toggle(0)

noize().out()

var H2 = HY5.hydra('hydra2', 'synth') // 2nd hydra
synth.s0.initP5()
H2.z(2) // double check on top

H2.pixelDensity(2) // 2x = retina, set <= 1 if laggy

synth.src(synth.s0)
	.modulateScale(synth.src(synth.o0).scale(1.01), .5)
	.out()
// sandbox - end


function setup() {
	createCanvas(windowWidth, windowHeight, WEBGL)
	noStroke()
	angleMode(DEGREES)
}

function draw() {
	clear()
	rotateY(frameCount/3)
	rotateX(frameCount/4)
	orbitControl(3)
	
	texture(H.get())
	sphere(height/3)
}

function keyPressed(){
	if(key == 'S'){
		H2.save() // save 2nd hydra
	}
}

contents.name: _hy5_hydra_p5_x4
contents.code:
/*
	_HY5_hydra_p5_x4 // cc teddavis.org 2024
	get hydra outputs as separate textures into p5
	docs: https://github.com/ffd8/hy5
*/

let libs = ['https://unpkg.com/hydra-synth', 'includes/libs/hydra-synth.js', 'https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/ffd8/hy5@main/hy5.js', 'includes/libs/hy5.js']

// sandbox - start
H.pixelDensity(.5) // experiment from .01 Ã‚Â» 2

// H.toggle(0)

osc().out()

noize().out(o1)

voronoi().out(o2)

gradient().out(o3)

render()
// sandbox - end


function setup() {
	createCanvas(windowWidth, windowHeight, WEBGL)
	noStroke()
	angleMode(DEGREES)
	P5.zIndex(1)
}

function draw() {
	clear()
	orbitControl(3)
	rotateX(frameCount/3)
	
	H.render() // get hydra o0-o3 as h0-h3
	translate(-height/2, 0)
	texture(h0)
	torus(height/4, height/12)
	
	translate(height/3, 0)
	rotateX(90)
	texture(h1)
	torus(height/4, height/12)
	
	translate(height/3, 0)
	rotateX(90)
	texture(h2)
	torus(height/4, height/12)
	
	translate(height/3, 0)
	rotateX(90)
	texture(h3)
	torus(height/4, height/12)
}

contents.name: _hy5_hydra_p5_x4-array
contents.code:
/*
	_HY5_hydra_p5_x4 // cc teddavis.org 2024
	get hydra outputs as separate [array of] textures into p5
	docs: https://github.com/ffd8/hy5
*/

let libs = ['https://unpkg.com/hydra-synth', 'includes/libs/hydra-synth.js', 'https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/ffd8/hy5@main/hy5.js', 'includes/libs/hy5.js']

// sandbox - start
H.pixelDensity(.5) // experiment from .01 Ã‚Â» 2
// H.toggle(0) // turn on/off layer

osc().out()
noize().out(o1)
voronoi().out(o2)
gradient().out(o3)

render()
// sandbox - end


function setup() {
	createCanvas(windowWidth, windowHeight, WEBGL)
	noStroke()
	angleMode(DEGREES)
	P5.zIndex(1)
}

function draw() {
	clear()
	orbitControl(3)
	H.render() // get hydra o0-o3 as h[0] - h[3]

	rotateX(frameCount / 3)
	for(let i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
		push()
		translate(-height / 2 + i * height / 3, 0)
		rotateX(i * 90)
		texture(h[i])
		torus(height / 4, height / 12)
		translate(height / 3, 0)
		pop()
	}
}

contents.name: _hydra-only
contents.code:
/*	
	_hydra_only // cc teddavis.org 2022
	incase you only want to play with ~[HYDRA]LIVE
	edit hydra code within '// sandbox start/stop' for smooth (eval) changes
	cheatsheets: https://hydra.ojack.xyz/api/ + https://hydra.ojack.xyz/docs
*/

// no p5
let libs = ['https://unpkg.com/hydra-synth', 'includes/libs/hydra-synth.js']
let hydra = new Hydra()
hydra.setResolution(window.innerWidth*2, window.innerHeight*2) // retina res

// sandbox - start

osc(10, .05, 1.3)
	.kaleid(8)
	.modulateScale(src(o0)
		.scale(1.5)
		.repeat(4, 4)
		.rotate(0, .1)
		.modulate(src(o0).scale(.4))
	)
	.out()

// sandbox - stop

contents.name: _hydra_texture
_hydra_scope
contents.code:
/*	
	_hydra_scope // cc ojack.xyz + teddavis.org 2021	
	use scoped for hydra's noise() function which p5.js also has
	+ see HY5 demos for better hydra + p5 bridge
*/

let libs = ['https://unpkg.com/hydra-synth', 'includes/libs/hydra-synth.js']

// hydra canvas + init
let hc = document.createElement('canvas') // hydra canvas + custom size
hc.width = 640 // window.innerWidth // for full res
hc.height = 360 // window.innerHeight // for full res
let hydra = new Hydra({
	detectAudio: false, // no mic
	canvas: hc, // use hydra canvas
	makeGlobal: false, // scoped
	autoLoop: false // custom tick() below
})
let synth = hydra.synth // scoped hydra

let pg // store hydra texture


// sandbox - start
synth.noise(8, .5)
	.modulate(synth.noise(5), .3)
	.modulate(synth.osc(5, .1, .2), .3)
	.out()
// sandbox - stop

function setup() {
	createCanvas(windowWidth, windowHeight, WEBGL)
	background(0)
	pg = createGraphics(hc.width, hc.height)
	noStroke()
}

function draw() {
	hydra.tick(1.5) // custom hydra animation speed!

	// grab + apply hydra texture
	pg.clear()
	pg.drawingContext.drawImage(hc, 0, 0, pg.width, pg.height)
	texture(pg)

	plane(width, height)

	rotateX(radians(frameCount / 8))
	rotateZ(radians(-frameCount / 6))
	box(height/3)
}

contents.name: _hydra_multi
_hydra_overlay
_hydra_feedback
contents.code:
/*	
	_hydra_scope // cc ojack.xyz + teddavis.org 2021
	go wild sending p5 into hydra and pulling it back!
	+ see HY5 demos for better hydra + p5 bridge
*/

let libs = ['https://unpkg.com/hydra-synth', 'includes/libs/hydra-synth.js']

let hc = document.createElement('canvas')
hc.width = window.innerWidth
hc.height = window.innerHeight
document.body.appendChild(hc)
let hydra = new Hydra({ detectAudio: false, canvas: hc })
// hydra.setResolution(window.innerWidth*2, window.innerHeight*2) // retina res
noize = noise // use noize() since noise() is taken by p5js

let pg // store hydra texture

// sandbox - start
src(o0)
	.layer(s0)
	.scroll(1.01, 1.01)
	.scale(1.01)
	.out()
// sandbox  - stop

function setup() {
	createCanvas(windowWidth, windowHeight, WEBGL)
	background(0)
	pg = createGraphics(hc.width, hc.height)
	s0.init({src: drawingContext.canvas })
}

function draw() {
	clear()
	pg.drawingContext.drawImage(hc, 0, 0, pg.width, pg.height)

	rotateX(radians(frameCount*.4))

	fill(255)
	stroke(0)
	strokeWeight(.5)
	if(mouseIsPressed){
		fill(0)
		stroke(255)
	}
	torus(height/6, 20)
	
	rotateY(radians(frameCount*.8))
	
	noStroke()
	texture(pg) // haha why no likey
	torus(height/4, height/12)
}
